p: We report the first case of P. jirovecii and SARS-CoV-2 detection in an individual with well controlled HIV. At the time of writing, only one other HIV/COVID-19 coinfection case has been published, with limited details of the individual's HIV status [ 1], and an European regional database of HIV/COVID-19 cases is currently under way [ 2]. We recommend further epidemiological data from HIV/COVID-19 cases to be collected and reported to understand the relationship between COVID-19, HIV, and antiretroviral therapy.
